name: Dark Lovers
description:
Hey!! Thanks for checking out my first game, Dark Lovers.

It’s a retro-style pixelated visual novel about a prom night from 1979.

The controls can be accessed at the main menu, but you can also play the entire game using your mouse’s left click only.

The game has four possible endings and two rare events.

To play, you must download the zip file, extract it and open the executable file in the game’s folder.

A version for Andrioid is still in development.

I hope you enjoy!! Happy Valentine's Day!! Thanks!!
